claim().details: Claims donation based rewards for the previous round

getBlocksSinceRoundEnd().details: Gets blocks since last round end.

isRatioPass(uint256[],uint256[],uint256).details: Checks if the service multisig liveness ratio passes the defined liveness threshold.

params.curNonces: Current service multisig set of a single nonce.
params.lastNonces: Last service multisig set of a single nonce.

returns.ratioPass: True, if the liveness ratio passes the check.

isRatioPass(uint256[],uint256[],uint256).notice: The ratio pass is true if there was a difference in donations between previous and current checkpoints.

withdrawIncentiveTokenBalance().notice: This function allows the owner to withdraw the incentive token balance from the contract.
